title: Chinesey Display Fonts?
content:
Can anyone recommend some good Chinese or oriental style display fonts that are fun and not hard to read? Something that appeals to kids.

This one was close, but has some funky letters.

[http://www.fontyukle.com/en/ara.php?ara=timescr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023161424/http:/www.fontyukle.com/en/ara.php?ara=timescr)
author: Jetski

comments.content:
Azuki caps are kick ass!

Michael
